newsitem.title: SRI LANKA: Sri stocks close shade up as correction nears end.
newsitem.headline: Sri stocks close shade up as correction nears end.

text.p: Sri Lanka stocks closed marginally up on Monday for the first time in three days on all round buying after a fall due to profit-taking brought prices back to reasonable levels, brokers said.
The all share index closed 1.7 points up at 717.9. Price declines edged out gains by 35 to 31. Ceylon Brewery rose 3.25 rupees to 56, Hayleys 10 to 230.
"I believe the bulk of the correction is now behind us and many stocks are again at attractive buying levels," said Dihan Dedigama of John Keells Stock Brokers.
Market correction began last week after Colombo stocks rose more than 15 percent in March and April.
